lasantha ghathana parikshanaya wartha kirimata ida nodima gana parikshanayak karanna – nidahas madhya wyaparaya lasantha ghathana parikshanaya wartha kirimata ida nodima gana parikshanayak karanna – nidahas madhya wyaparaya lasantha wika්ramathunga ghathana parikshana sandaha ohuge mrutha dehaya godagath awasthawedi eya wartha kirimata giya madhyawedinta badha karamin polisiya aththanomathika lesata hasurunu bawath eeta siya wirodhaya palakara sitina bawath madhya niwedanayak nikuthkaramin nidahas madhya wyaparaya pa්rakasha karayi.
